Neutral_Files: .json/.xml for scenario states, .mp4 for scenario replays
Metadata: Solver version, HPC job ID, user, date/time, mission scenario name
Analysis type (Monte Carlo, single-run deterministic, agent-based, etc.)

Scenario_Exchange: MSDL (Military Scenario Definition Language), if used
Some IEEE standards for distributed simulation (HLA, DIS)

Entity_Engagements: Kills, losses, detection events, sensor acquisitions
Time_Based_Events: Event logs with timestamps, triggers, or mission phase transitions
Resource_Usage: Fuel consumption, ammo usage, comm bandwidth
Performance_Metrics: Mission success probability, LOS coverage, area coverage
System_Interactions: Data links, agent messages, synergy between platforms
